c74object.name: tap.scale~
c74object.digest: Audio version of the scale object
c74object.description: The tap.scale~ object is an audio version of the standard scale object.

objarg.name: inlow
objarg.description: Sets the low bound of the input.

objarg.name: inhigh
objarg.description: Sets the high bound of the input.

objarg.name: outlow
objarg.description: Sets the low bound of the output.

objarg.name: outhigh
objarg.description: Sets the high bound of the output.

method.name: float
method.description: Set the input and output ranges for the scaling to be applied to the signal at the first inlet.
